H0.text: Staphylococcus and Streptococcus are types of. Bacteria

H1.text: Staphylococcus and Streptococcus are types of. Microbes

H2.text: Staphylococcus and Streptococcus are types of. Pathogens

H3.text: Staphylococcus and Streptococcus are types of. Bacium

A4.text: Some organisms, such as Staphylococcus or Streptococcus, can cause skin infections, pneumonia, meningitis and sepsis
